subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In winning 20 of 21 games to finish the regular season and begin the postseason, the Rockies have mixed hitting, pitching, defense and good luck to put themselves on the verge of their first World Series.
snippet: In winning 20 of 21 games to finish the regular season and begin the postseason, the Rockies have mixed hitting, pitching, defense and good luck to put themselves on the verge of their first World Series.
